title: Korkma Ben Yanındayım
overview: Inci, the apple of her family's eye, is a scholarship student at Ulusözler College. She gets pregnant by Mert, her classmate, who is also the son of the owner of the school she attends. The lives of the two young people who are preparing for the university exam and running after their dreams change forever. The change in these children's lives will also deeply affect their families.
